welcome_message_body: Welcome to Itupeva, Brazil! Known for its charming vineyards and beautiful landscapes, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. Cheers to a wonderful stay in Itupeva!

airports.airport_name: Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
